about_the_game:
The Anemone Music Pack by Ayato Sound Create offers 25 brand-new tracks for those inspired to build an enchanting new RPG. This pack adds some nice electronic beats for creating a fast tempoed atmosphere, with additional moments of chill and ambient tones when your game needs that perfect change of pace.

Furthermore, the Anemone Music Pack also lends sounds of dubstep and those of a darker themed techno that could be exactly what you’re looking for when it comes to intense moments in your RPG’s story or perhaps a reveal of power for your world’s greatest foe. This electronic pack is the perfect soundtrack for your next RPG!

Features:

* 25 songs in mp3, m4a, ogg, wav and looping ogg formats
* Royalty-free music for your games!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
